paddingSchemes
Class BlocksOf3Padding

java.lang.Object
  paddingSchemes.BlocksOf3Padding

public class BlocksOf3Padding
extends java.lang.Object

Padding scheme for cryptography. Divides plaintext into blocks of 3 letters. Encodes text blocks to numbers. Decodes numbers back to text blocks. Restructures text blocks to plaintext. Returns full encoding/decoding formulas. Returns full encoding+encrypting formulas from plaintext. Returns full decrypting+decoding formulas from cryptotext. Secure method to allow encode+encrypt to return only cryptotext. Secure method to allow decrypt+decode to return only plaintext. NOTE: Maximum value of a group (ZZZ) is 25*26^2 + 25*26^1 + 25*26^0 = 17575(=26^3-1) so a modulus n greater than this value is required.

Since:
25.1.2009
Author:
Petri Tuononen
